articles.description: Watch BBC Radio 5 Live Final Score and follow text updates as Newcastle visit AC Milan before Man City host Red Star Belgrade.
articles.title: Champions League: AC Milan v Newcastle build-up - follow live

articles.description: Listen to Sportsound commentary and follow live text updates as Celtic open their Champions League campaign away to Feyenoord.
articles.title: Champions League: Celtic travel to face Feyenoord in opener

articles.description: Newcastle mark their return to the Champions League after a 20-year absence with a creditable draw at AC Milan.
articles.title: Newcastle draw at Milan on Champions League return

articles.description: Jenni Hermoso says the decision to call-up players who are boycotting the national team is proof "nothing has changed" at the Spanish FA.
articles.title: Spain squad shows 'nothing has changed' - Hermoso

articles.description: Follow live text commentary from Tuesday's six Championship matches as well as League One and EFL Trophy action.
articles.title: EFL: Six Championship games as well as League One action

articles.description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola appears to laugh at the suggestion Manchester United are Premier League title rivals.
articles.title: Guardiola laughs when Man Utd suggested as title rivals

articles.description: Leona Maguire says it will be as much as a "physical test, as a mental test" as Europe look to claim a record third consecutive victory in the Solheim Cup.
articles.title: Maguire braced for 'physical & mental' test

articles.description: Great Britain will play Novak Djokovic’s Serbia in the quarter-finals of the Davis Cup in Malaga in November.
articles.title: Britain to face Serbia in Davis Cup quarter-finals

articles.description: England forward Rachel Daly says situation with Spanish national team is "heartbreaking" and shows how far women's football still has to go.
articles.title: Spain situation 'heartbreaking', says England's Daly

articles.description: England captain Harry Kane says international team-mate Harry Maguire has been "scapegoated" and faced "unnecessary scrutiny".
articles.title: Maguire has been made a scapegoat - Kane
